price: Mọryam, tẹ̀lé àṣẹ Olúwa rẹ. Forí kanlẹ̀ fún Un. Kí o sì dáwọ́tẹ orúnkún pẹ̀lú àwọn olùdáwọ́tẹ-orúnkún (lórí ìrun).
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
